positive_examples: This is an example of metal powder.
The metal powder demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed metal powder in this context.
A typical case of metal powder would involve these features.
The concept of metal powder applies here.
Fine particles of metal used in manufacturing, 3D printing, and metallurgical processes.
negative_examples: This is an example of fallout, not metal powder.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Fallout, or other types of Powder

definition: Finely divided particles of metallic material used in manufacturing or chemical processes.
